summary: Vampire Royal Mage Armor using the Archmage robe enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
THIS MOD WAS MADE BY REQUEST ONLY. I WILL NOT BE UPDATING THIS MOD.

Vampire Royal Mage Armor.

This mod simply adds a version of Vampire Royal Armor that has the Arch-Mage enchantment attached, except with +100% Magicka rate changed to +125% Magicka rate to match the original vampire royal armor.

Due to the power of this item the crafting recipe is very expensive:
-3 Human Heart
-6 Filled Black Soul Gem
-8 Leather Strip
-16 Leather
-32 Vampire Dust

The armor can be found in the Leather crafting section.

You can also download the alternate version to use the following recipe instead:
-1 Archmage Robes
-1 Vampire Royal Armor
-3 Human Heart
-6 Filled Black Soul Gem
-8 Leather Strip
-16 Leather

Please install only one of the versions but not both.

Note this is a standalone armor and will not affect the original Vampire Royal Armor in any way.
author: DefiniteIntegral
